issue.title: Unhandled API deprecations

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body:
As mentioned [here](https://developer.github.com/v3/versions/#v3-deprecations) there are 25 deprecations which are still supported, but will be removed in the next major release. 

Of the 25 points, I found 3 that need to be fixed (points 17, 19 and 25); 

17) User.bio() can be removed or marked with `@ Deprecated` since it's obsolete

19) User.gravatar() can be removed or marked with `@ Deprecated`

25) Attribute "assignee" of an Issue becomes "assignees" - this needs a little more attention; it's work in `MkIssue` and `Issue.Smart` -> for instance `Issue.assignee() : User` becomes `Issue.assignees() : List<User>` and also `Issue.Smart.assign(String)` needs to be redesigned etc

body: @yegor256 please take a look at it and dispatch (see [par.21](http://at.teamed.io/policy.html#21))
@amihaiemil we should just remove it, thanks
@amihaiemil many thanks for the bug report, I added 15 mins to your acc, transaction `AP-70Y152811X113963H`
